name: Ezero
description:
Ezero is a first-person pyschological story exploration-puzzle game.

You find yourself alone outside a locked building, not knowing who you are or why you are here. You must find a way into the building, and through exploring and interacting with the rooms and their contents, realise who you are and how you got here. There are some things about yourself you have been in denial about. Can you finally face your hidden fears and try to make amends?

Enjoy:) and please let us know your thoughts! This is our first game and we would really appreciate any feedback!
